subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Evan Longoria hit a solo home run and drove in four runs to help the Tampa Bay Rays beat the visiting Texas Rangers, 8-6, and complete a sweep of the three-game set between potential playoff opponents.
snippet: Evan Longoria hit a solo home run and drove in four runs to help the Tampa Bay Rays beat the visiting Texas Rangers, 8-6, and complete a sweep of the three-game set between potential playoff opponents.
